alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 8:47AM CST until February 26 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall on Monday and additional heavy rainfall through tonight over the Tombigbee River basin will result in water rises and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 89.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 101.5 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
